query:
SELECT 
  client_name,
  account_manager,
  business_type,
  status,
  hourly_rate,
  monthly_retainer,
  bank_hours,
  used_hours,
  email,
  phone,
  contact_person,
  start_date,
  notes,
  currency,
  projects_link,
  tasks_link,
  billing_link
FROM crm_clients 
LIMIT 5;
